title: New: Flo Morrissey – If You Can’t Love This All Goes Away
content:
Photo: Daisy Frost

Whilst away on holiday I missed this gem from London teenage songstress Flo Morrissey, entitled If You Can’t Love This All Goes Away. Pulling from her eclectic range of influences, with the likes of Antony & The Johnsons and Billie Holiday both appearing to form inspiration for her new track, Flo’s vocals are as elegant as ever, singing with a maturity far beyond her modest years. Whilst the production may at times be a little iffy, there’s no telling just how far this beautiful young woman could go with the right care and investment.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
